website_summaries.verdict: A quality substitute for that old sliced white bread you used to love.
pros: Glutino bread toasts perfectly, but it can be eaten straight out of the bag as well
Similar in taste and texture to traditional white bread
Texture is soft and fluffy while remaining strong enough to support sandwich toppings
Bread lasts in the freezer and thaws nicely
cons: We recommend freezing it if you won't finish a loaf within a few days

customer_reviews.title: Glutino GF Bread
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of this bread. I recently moved and in my current location it is not available. I went online and bought six loaves, but when it arrived it was a new recipe. I do not like it near as much. It is hard like all typical gluten free breads. The original was so much better. Now I have to find a new bread which is going to be difficult. I hope they go back to the original.
customer_reviews.author: shanna berrer

customer_reviews.title: Having the bread delivered was convenient. It was hassle ...
customer_reviews.text: Having the bread delivered was convenient. It was hassle free. No running from store to store trying to find it. I am very impressed. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: littleprinessmom

customer_reviews.title: Package it a little better for shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bread! It’s taste and texture are the best I have found in gluten free breads. I first found it in San Diego. Then after returning home I found it at Amazon & ordered it. Unfortunately almost every slice of the 5 loaves I ordered was broken into pieces from the shipping & handling. I love it so much I will eat it anyway, but it will be awkward to make a sandwich with it. I will make gluten free croutons with it and I can use it as a filler when making gluten free meatloaf. If it hadn’t fallen apart from shipping I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Garrits1

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love!!! Thank You! I am so appreciative of how fast it arrived & how it was stored & wrapped in the box! Suffering with celiac it’s the only bread I like & I am thrilled I found your store to purchase the bread. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Maria J. Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The Bread that arrived was dry and inedible except for toast. The price was exorbitant but where we live in Eastern Montana is 250 milestone from the nearest grocer that stocks this particular bread and my husband needed it so we ordered it rather than drive 500 miles roundtrip for bread. I'll plan ahead next time and not run out.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl wilken

customer_reviews.title: New recipe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bread expecting the usual recipe I have been eating for the last year. What arrived was their new recipe. The texture is completely different and does not work well if you like to toast the bread. I have gut issues and this new recipe does not sit well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Wierth

customer_reviews.title: Do keep frozen then refrigerate after opening to keep it fresh longer
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My favorite white bread so far and right on time! I like getting it in 6 packs to keep in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mckibbon

customer_reviews.title: Best GF bread ever!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find in stores...best gf bread for sandwiches ever...no need to toast!
customer_reviews.author: Julia F.

customer_reviews.title: ... eating gluten all her life) and this is the best bread we've tried
customer_reviews.text: I recently discovered my daughter is gluten intolerant (we've been eating gluten all her life) and this is the best bread we've tried. It has a great taste, texture and size. My daughter is happy to be able to enjoy sandwiches again without the troublesome side affects of gluten!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great GF bread ruined when they “improved” it
customer_reviews.text: Glutino has ruined what used to be the best gluten-free sandwich bread around. It used to have the best flavor and texture, very close to “real” bread, but now it’s too sweet and is crumbly like all the other GFs and turns gummy when toasted.
customer_reviews.author: Judith B

customer_reviews.title: My favorite GF bread!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found bread that is tasty. Small, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: cyn

customer_reviews.title: Taste great, price needs to be lower
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, price is not. Found other sources selling the same with free shipping for much less per case.
customer_reviews.author: MusicMaster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s softer than any other gluten free breads that i have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Rhenda Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: They product was inedible & I received no response to my email.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box, the bread was crushed. I emailed to let them know that the entire box of bread was destroyed & got no response. Publix was able to order the bread. I will order this product from Publix in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best gluten free bread out there, happy I can order it throught Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Frazee

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: I received the box and it was not crushed, and the bread was fresh. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: bev s.

customer_reviews.title: Best GF Bread
customer_reviews.text: This is the by far the best gluten free bread and makes the BEST toast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product -- sandwiches are good again!
customer_reviews.text: The picture here is different than the wrapper of my product. I'm reviewing "Glutino Gluten Free Bread, White Sandwich Bread." This bread is fantastic -- very similar to regular white bread you would buy in the store. I have tried at least 6 brands of GF bread and not one was edible untoasted and only barely edible toasted. I've also made several mixes and "from scratch" loaves -- none was enjoyable to eat. This is a different story. I've had at least one sandwich a day since I discovered it. The taste and texture are both excellent. No grit, no sponginess, no sliminess. Just bread. This product has made lunch a pleasure again!
customer_reviews.author: CatLover

customer_reviews.title: Finally, edible gluten free bread!  Rejoice!
customer_reviews.text: Since being diagnosed as a celiac I have mourned the lack of an edible sandwich bread. I adore sandwiches, and hot buttered toast and a cup of tea will set my grumpy self happy again. After trying and loving their original english muffins I decided to give their bread a try, and boy and I happy I did! My only regret is that I didn't try this bread sooner! I've yet to toast it as its yummy as it is. Even my gluten loving and eating hubby will happily eat this bread which tells me its good bread, not just good for being gluten free.
customer_reviews.author: Gill

customer_reviews.title: New IMPROVED recipe, NOT
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product by the case for several years. The new IMPROVED recipe ruined what was the best gluten free white bread I have tasted. I am stuck with 5 loaves which I will not eat! It looks great, but doesn't taste as good. The big problem is that it is gummy. No wonder - water is the first ingredient, followed by pea starch. They've lost my business. I gave one star because the review would not allow none.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs V

customer_reviews.title: Bad deal
customer_reviews.text: Glutino made this product an oz smaller and cost more
customer_reviews.author: Rich Nelson

customer_reviews.title: This brand is the best, I have tried many different brands and none ...
customer_reviews.text: This brand is the best, I have tried many different brands and none of them are as good as Glutino. I prefer a million times this one over regular breads (including those with wheat) I don't live in United States so every time a friend goes to a Wholefoods or whatever, I ask them to bring as many as they can. Way better than Udi's. You really should try it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Original Recipe Much Better
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with new recipe. Not as soft and consistency is heavier. And falls apart easily. Stopped buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Chalk
customer_reviews.text: I've never tried it as I don't eat any grains. Both my kids have used it. My daughter has it as french toast and says it is not as good as Udi's and my son says it tastes like chalk and he only eats it for lunch because he is hungry at school. Won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Victor E

product_meta.title: Glutino Gluten Free White Sandwich Bread [Case of 6]
product_meta.description: Storage Instructions: Keep Frozen. For best results, toast before serving.
